metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18520 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
An Invalid Memory Address Dereference exists in the function elf_end in libelf in elfutils through v0.174. Although eu-size is intended to support ar files inside ar files, handle_ar in size.c closes the outer ar file before handling all inner entries. The vulnerability allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) with a crafted ELF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18520` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.165-3ubuntu1.2
libasm1 - 0.165-3ubuntu1.2
libdw1 - 0.165-3ubuntu1.2
libelf1 - 0.165-3ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.165-3ubuntu1.2').
